SELECT count(DISTINCT tx.TaxonID) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT tax.TaxonID,tax.NodeNumber FROM (SELECT TaxonID FROM determination WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND determination.IsCurrent <> 0) as Genera1,taxon as tax WHERE tax.IsAccepted <> 0 and tax.TaxonID = Genera1.TaxonID) as Genera2, taxon as tx WHERE Genera2.NodeNumber between tx.NodeNumber and tx.HighestChildNodeNumber
SELECT count(*) FROM taxon WHERE TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID
SELECT count(*) FROM geography WHERE GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID

SELECT count(DISTINCT g.GeographyID) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT geo.GeographyID,geo.NodeNumber FROM (SELECT GeographyID FROM locality WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID) as TBL1,geography as geo WHERE geo.IsAccepted <> 0 and geo.GeographyID = TBL1.GeographyID) as TBL2, geography as g WHERE TBL2.NodeNumber between g.NodeNumber and g.HighestChildNodeNumber
SELECT count(*) FROM locality WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID
